name: Timothy Anderson
text: Some of the best pizza I have ever had.  Did the house special pizza, with avocado and artichoke appetizer.  Both were very good, ended up with a couple take home boxes.  They can accommodate large groups.  With both indoor and outdoor dining.  Currently the on tap beer selection is limited, still should be able to find a good one.

name: Jenna Arthur
text: Mellow mushroom is not only awesome to look at with it's vivid colors, neon lights and great wall graphics, it also has great food! I am lactose intolerant and vegetarian, so you can Imagine it's hard to find pizza places. But mellow mushroom has lots of vegan options! Great for everyone.

name: Barbie Crowder
text: My husband and I ordered the small Mighty Meaty. It was the perfect size and delicious.  The waitress was very attentive and provided us with refills just at the right time.  An added bonus.... the background music they played wasn't too loud to where you could have a conversation and the selection was awesome.

name: CJ Chokehold
text: Absolutely wonderful food for the price. I loved my app and my entree. Everything tastes so fresh and well made. The staff were very friendly and kind. I absolutely reccomend this place. There's tons of options, something to fit everyones taste!

name: Erika Wheeler
text:
Decided when we were leaving PetSmart that we would stop at Mellow & grab some $1.00 üçïüçï. (.55 each add. topping)
üó£ Its a local Monday night thing in our town. $2.00 PBRüç∫ too! Pizza was good, ‚Ä¶More

name: LaRussa Lakes
text: Placed call in order and had to wait 40 minutes for them to forget part of my order. They did offer to add it which meant I was gonna have to pay for it and wait an additional 10-15 minutes. Very upset.

name: Jan Edwards
text: The food and service were good. The prices are a bit high for pizza. I also got stung by a yellow jacket. Another hazard of eating outside and the covid

name: shane simpson
text: Way too expensive. Pizza is not worth what they are trying to charge. Service was good but I'll go somewhere else next time.

name: Joel Nichols
text: Pizza was phenomenal. The crust was outstanding.  Nice atmosphere!

name: Teddy Testerman
text: Terrible service! My wife and I were going to get some dinner once seated we put in an order for drinks and an appetizer. Our waitress brings our drinks and never asked if we were ready to order. We wait at least 15 minutes thinking she ‚Ä¶More

name: Jamie B
text: Sandwiches weren't much to be desired, the burgers were frozen, so couldn't be ordered. Only one of the 3 of our orders was good.  Best thing was the pretzel bites. Pretty sad dining experience.

name: Lonnie Thomas
text: Pizza is off the charts with flavor. I braved the pandemic just to go have some. Really great!

name: Rhonda Rice
text: They seemed to be slow about getting food out. There were 3 pizzas, 2 subs, and 2 chef salads ordered and it took about an hour to get our food. It was good once we got it.

name: ZombiesButterfly
text: Wonderful food and atmosphere. Friendly staff made the experience.

name: Rob Sheppard
text: Awesome food and staff! Never disappointed

name: Barbara Tickle
text: We called in the pizza.my 1st time eating here. Worst pizza I ever ate. The crust was like rubber and the pizza was cold I couldn't even eat it.. was disappointed bc I heard nothing but good things about the place. Now I'm bummed out.

name: Joanna McGhee
text: Me and my husband just left this restraunt  tonight and finally got to eat our pizza we had ordered 2 hours prior as a take out order. This was the worst experience we have ever had at a restaurant. We go eat at this location many times a ‚Ä¶More

name: Dustin Dement
text: Great place to eat really good food and really good people but the more you drink the crazier the walls get but a great place and it's not badly priced

name: Ty S
text:
So unfortunately I made a to go order and their printer went down. Out of their control.
I came in and my order wasn't started yet. However, what the manager and entire team did to make me feel welcome was incredible. Thanks for the awesome service and great food!

name: M Vaughn
text:
Always good food and service! Love this location!

Update. Just went in after about a months absence. Not looking good. Waited to ‚Ä¶More

name: Clabon Wilkey
text:
Service was Awesome! Food was great and the atmosphere was welcoming.

We stopped in on our way back home from a wedding to watch the end of the ‚Ä¶More

name: Allen Chafin
text: The food and service is always wonderful the food never disappointing always excellent

name: Desiree Reed
text: Just DELISH!

name: Andrea Gross
text: Pricy but really good. Unfortunately my pizxa was a bit burnt.

name: Khalik Lipford
text: Food was great! Enjoyed my philly steak sandwich and son enjoyed calzone..

name: James Walls
text: Great food and service. Dont eat outside if its warm bugs will eat you up

name: Matt Van Steen
text: Excellent service and awesome pizza!! Thanks for having vegan options!!! A++ experience!!

name: Jeff Maxfield
text: Not very clean, trash all in the landscaping and in the outdoor seating area. Overpriced for the quality of the pizza.

name: paul matticks
text: Great pizza, nice menu, good bar selection

name: Richard H√∏lster
text: One of the best Mellow Mushroom restaurants that I've tried. Excellent plain pizza with a chewy crust and just the right amount of Parmesan cheese.  Perfect!

name: Focus Teqz
text: Very good food and very good services

name: DH Geer
text:
First, I have to say the food was good.
The sevice  was non- existent. I ordered a salad and soup and an appetizer.  I figured ordering these would be quick. ‚Ä¶More

name: Rayne French
text: It was a Saturday night so we knew we were in for a wait. Our server apologized over and over and over. The food was excellent and well worth the time.

name: Colton Breving
text: They said the only vegan crust they had was the small gluten free, thin crust, that they don't have green olives, and that they don't have any garlic but garlic butter. That has not been the case at every other mellow mushroom I've ever ‚Ä¶More

name: Matthew Richardson
text: First time eating here. The different toppings and specialty pizzas they had was amazing. The amount of beer they had on tap was mind blowing. It was a whole sheet full (40 or more if I had to guess. The dining area was well laid out and ‚Ä¶More

name: Belinda Clem
text: Loved it!   Expensive but the food is AMAZING!!!!!

name: Timothy Lawson
text: Excellent service tonight. A special for every night. Great pizza, great wings, and a killer chef salad. Come here to relax and enjoy.

name: Emily Esposito
text: The mellow mushroom is the perfect Friday night spot, the patio has live music and a great atmosphere. The staff is incredibly friendly and sociable. The food is as incredible as the rest of the restaurant, with many options, including vegetarian.

name: shanna Lyon
text:
Pizza was great! Loved the warm Marinara sauce.
We went sunday after church and it wasn't crowded.

name: Sherry Harris
text: Went there on a Thursday night to play Bingo, it was a blast. Good food, good atmosphere

name: Mark Storms
text: For a chain pizza place, you can't get better than this for thin crust pizza. I am from Chicago, so I know deep dish pizza...that is not why you go to Mellow Mushroom. You go there for fantastic crusts and eclectic topping combinations. I ‚Ä¶More

name: Vanessa Kingston
text: I had the great white pizza and it was the bomb, their Arnold palmer drink is pretty weak.. a bit pricey, but overall their food is great.

name: Charlie Puckett
text: Great wings and pizza.

name: Venuto Woman
text: The vegan Thai Dye pizza is ssoooooo good! They always have a great beer list! Lots of locals brews!

name: Amanda Carrico
text: UPDATE:  Changing my 1 star rating to 3 stars due to my conversation with Management.  Jon was very responsive, receptive to my observations, and appreciative of the feedback. ‚Ä¶More

name: Julie Laidlaw
text: Update:  We used to give them 5 stars.  However, over the last year or so, I don't know what's happened.  Five times in a row they got our food wrong.  Twice it was the wrong pizza.  Once the appetizer didn't show up until half way through ‚Ä¶More

name: Renee Edwards
text: Awesome place to eat and hang out with friends and family!

name: Wesley Mitcham
text: Don't do curbside. Order was supposed to be ready at 5:15, got it at 6:00 after multiple phone calls, then finally just having to go in.

name: Karen Humbert
text: First time. Pizza was amazing. Monday's is a 1 a slice day plus .55 for toppings. Slices are HUGE. We each got what we wanted. Our waitress was Ireland. She was energetic, helpful, and patient with us. We will be back!

name: lynleahb
text: This was our first time eating there. Their pizzas are delicious! The menu is great and I love the atmosphere! Staff was very friendly and professional!

name: Kristina Kilgore Wiggs
text: The mushroom soup is excellent and surprisingly low in calories.

name: Marcie Rose
text: Did not dis like it. But not my fav. Lol good in a fix.

name: Grayson Harris
text: So good. Pizza is so good. Not to mention the pizza, and how good it was. I had so much pizza I couldn't eat any more pizza. Pizza is so good. The art was cool and represented local culture in a fun and modern way. Please do yourself a favor and go to Mellow Mushroom.

name: Molly McPike
text: Vegan pizza!! Yes please!!! They have vegan cheese, their dough is vegan and they offer tofu and Seitan as toppings!! So good!!

name: Dave Baldwin
text: Mellow Mushroom has a really wide variety of pizza selections, in addition to "select your own toppings". We usually get their house pizza. It has lots of toppings - meats and veggies - at a great price. That and their Greek salad made a ‚Ä¶More

name: Nicolas Duarte
text: Fantastic food, strong drinks, and great service.  What more could you ask for?  I was pleasantly surprised that they have more than great pizza.  The salads, wings, and special Mellow Pops were great.  Wish they had these up where I live.

name: Chris Gerard
text: Have always had good experiences at many Mellow Mushroom locations around the Southeast. This particular location was not terribly busy on the night we came (maybe 50% of the tables full). It took almost 10 minutes to get drinks, and upon ‚Ä¶More

name: Alex Landing
text: Sunday afternoon walked in at 5pm placed our order for appetizers and pizza by 5:10. Most booths were full, stand alone tables were empty. A party was in a outdoor tent/room. At 6:30 we left and they handed us our pizzas in boxes 15 minutes ‚Ä¶More

name: Adam Hatfield
text: Very cozy place for a night out with the wife or the whole family. Amazing selection on some very unique dishes. I was suprised the first time coming here on how good the food was. Very warm friendly staff who seem to enjoy serving you. Amazing food but not cheap. In my opinion its more than worth the money.

name: K Bell
text: Great choice of gluten free food. The pizza, hot wings and salad were delicious!

name: Michelle Montgomery
text: Great pizza at a decent price. Nice friendly staff and cool atmosphere.

name: Karen R
text: horrible. full of flies. generally dirty. staff seemed in able to keep up with orders.

name: Madeline Connor
text:
8/19 update
I have posted a photo of the dime sized chip on the plastic bowl my soup was served in.  Is this sanitary??? ‚Ä¶More

name: Joshua Jackson
text: There wings are really good as well as the sandwiches, cheese breads,etc... The pizzas are alright too but for they are not anything close to what you can get for a fraction of the cost elsewhere. They do use fresh meats and veggies but to ‚Ä¶More

name: Nemo In TN
text: Locals lunch is the BEST!! $6.99 for 2 of a great variety of options. We ordered the 2 1-topping slices, jerk wings, sweet Thai chili wings & salad. The wings were excellent! Pizza was hot & delicious! Salad was so big we ended up getting ‚Ä¶More

name: Michelle Manasmontri
text: Omg I love their happy hour wings! If I could afford it I'd eat them at least every other day. Way better than any other place I've tried in Bristol.

name: Sarah Robbins
text: Liars. I asked specifically if the GF crust was vegan and was told "all of our pizzas can be made vegan, so yes." Too expensive.. I ordered 2 GF pizzas & a salad ($61), none of it was vegan (like I thought I ordered). Pretty much stole my money and I got nothing (but sick with anxiety). I want my money back.

name: Laura P
text: The lunch special was really good as well as the coffee.

name: Property Services Of VA LLC
text: Great food. Fun place. Gluten free options and Vegan options.

name: Cheri Brannan
text: Service was prompt. I ordered naked wings and finished them pretty quick-they were so good! I ordered a second order and i didn‚Äôt have to wait long.  The salad my husband ordered was really huge!

name: April Hoyos
text: An amazing experience thanks to Ireland. She was the best!! Definitely made our night.

name: Bryan Tinsley
text: Its so annoying they don't sell by the slice.  Getting a family of 4 to agree on a cosmic karma style pizza is a nightmare.  Food tasted good and service was good.  Atmosphere is lacking.  Its supposed to be hippie theme and its gone corporate. Nothing bad but nothing special either.

name: jeanette Roth
text: Love the pizza! Service is sometimes slow.

name: Annette Stellhorn
text: Came in for just the pizza.  Placed the order and then waited an hour and twenty before we had to leave.  Guy camenin for Carry out and had waited 1.30 hours.  No food coming out of kitchen and not looking busy.  Just badly managed I guess

name: Hina Surma
text: Nice food. Caring Staff üëåüëåüëå

name: David Karshner
text: Very friendly manager and staff they have definitely changed the culture here to the good. Keep up the great work! The Monday specials are great.

name: Mark Fulton
text: Mellow mushroom has good pizza, however I always get the Italian Hoggie Sub. If you're a mayonnaise lover then that's the one to get.

name: delsdomain33
text: Very good gluten free pizza and friendly staff.

name: Brandy Davenport
text: Food was great but we had to wait forever for it. In all fairness, they did have a large party to attend to at the time; but we looked around to see that we were the only ones without food, including those who were seated after us. Not the best experience, but we really loved the pizza once it arrived.

name: Daniel Morrison
text: Good food nice people

name: Bill Hampton
text:
Great atmosphere! Food is very, very good. All üçï is made to order, fresh, hot out of the brick oven. Fabulous!!
Waitstaff, attentive, sincere, lots of personality. Make you feel appreciated. ‚Ä¶More

name: David Hutcherson
text: Friendly staff a d good food

name: John D
text: Nice place to eat pizza was great and the chef salad was excellent and plenty to go around.

name: Thomas Ball
text: If ood was good but took a little time to get it.

name: Brian Logan
text: Good people. Ya buddy! Good bar tenders. Oh ya. Totally comfortable. Very easy place to kick back. Keep up the good work mellow mushroom!

name: Anthony Reece
text: The wings were surprisingly good!  And pizza, as always, is outstanding.

name: Klay Davis
text: Decent pizza. Pretty pricy though. We paid 48 bucks for 2 medium pizzas, a small salad and 3 waters. Ouch.

name: Amber Davis
text: We used to enjoy going here. Today my family (3 of us) walked in, and approximately six employees were standing at the host station. No one acknowledged us, and two of them actually turned around and walked away. We stood there for just a little bit, and then left. It was around 4 pm, so there were only a few tables with customers.

name: Keith Waycaster
text: Great food and great service. Nice atmosphere.

name: Jeremy Pierce
text: Food was perfect and good service.

name: Turner Ward
text: Good fast pizza can't go wrong with anything here

name: Booker Davis
text: Great salads and the pizza is incredible.  The service is always great,  Ireland is a really cool server,  it takes charisma like hers to make the visit comfortable.

name: Jay Overbey
text: Great Happy Hours Specials!

name: Rita Zywica
text: Food was fantastic. Had an issue with a drink from the bar - not sure how a bartender can mess up a classic drink, but they corrected it. I just would have liked it right the first time

name: Steven Luther
text: Great food! Great wait staff and manager. The kitchen was a little on the unorganized side though. The problem was quickly resolved, management went above and beyond what they needed to, to resolve the issue.

name: ed pick
text: Mushroom soup was good although given a teaspoon to eat it with. Bruschetta was also good. Unfortunately salad was served with browning lettuce and so, unappetizing. Help was friendly.

name: Kates Ali
text: Pretty good food.

name: b b
text: Love their crust, and that they have vegan options.

name: Gina Herbert
text: Great pizza but it's kind of high, still would return.

name: Eva Brandenburg
text: Love love love mellow mushroom, but this branch has spiraled way down hill. Third bad experience in a row with terrible service and problems with the bill. Maybe new management is needed

name: Lisa Rudd
text: The food was really good but the service was a bit slow. However we found out one of the cooks had to leave because of an emergency.  The atmosphere was fun and the restaurant was clean even though they were short staffed.  Overall a wonderful experience.

name: Maziar Momeni
text: We swing by this location once a year as we drive up from Atlanta to DC. We order ahead and eat a few slices then we hit the road. That said, they always have our order hot and ready when we get there. The servers are friendly and are ‚Ä¶More

name: Baylen green is cool

name: Dustin Castle
text: Waitress was good but that was about it. Ended up sitting there for about an hour and a half waiting for pizza. The restaurant was not busy at all and the cooks didn't seem to care.

name: Nancy Regan
text: So far I have waited an hour for 2 slices of cheese pizza. Still waiting.

name: Larry Robertstad
text: Good food and nice employees

name: Skip Barker
text: Their Thai-Dai pizza is the best.

name: Sonya Higgins
text: Service was horrible.  We asked to be seated outside and there was bird poop everywhere.  The outside patio area definitely needs to be cleaned.

name: James Greer
text: Food was excellent, great service. Waited longer than expected for our food though, but still great!

name: Rose Lucas
text: As usual always great & good customer service.

name: Tracey Baucom
text: Service was great, hummus was great (and cheaper than in Mobile Alabama) and vegan pizza was great!

name: Josh Primm
text: Pizza is so good and love the pretzel type crust

name: Colby Fletcher
text: Great service  relatively cheap food

name: Emyioni Whitaker
text: It had a really nice atmosphere. The pizza was pretty good. I ate here with a friend and shared a small pizza. It was perfect for us. It's a little on the pricey side for a pizza but i would eat here again

name: Greg Govertsen

name: Art Arsenault
text: Great pizza and excellent beer selections

name: Plant Fueled Ginger
text: Vegan and gluten free pizza

name: George Wood
text: This place is the worst. Our server was non existent, our table ordered 5 pizzas and all were burnt, the wait for the food was over an hour, the table of 6 next to us left with no food after an hour. Discussed all of the above with the ‚Ä¶More

name: Becky Pohle
text: I'd like to hope it was just a bad evening.. We waited for 45 after ordering for our food (a tasty burger and a VERY boring turkey sandwich). There were more empty tables than occupied ones, so I don't think it was too packed to keep up ‚Ä¶More

name: Private Snowflake
text: Great customer service.  They didn't get a pizza the way they wanted to serve it,  so they made another free of charge.

name: Jessica Shortz
text: Pizza, sandwiches, and more in a setting reminiscent of a psychedelic sports bar. Pizza (Maui Wowie) was spectacular (though we would have been happier with more pineapple in place of some of the banana peppers). Pretzel appetizer was good, ‚Ä¶More

name: Amber
text: I have had continually bad experiences there with the service. It is awful. Which is a shame because the food is good.

name: Duddy Outdoors
text: Good food and good drinks, as well as a decent atmosphere.

name: Aaron Gordon
text: No big oofs from this place most of the time. Service usually sucks but the pizza es goot.

name: Andrea Livermore
text: Everything was SO good! Wide selection of IPA as well as domestic beers. I had the funky chicken pizza and was more than satisfied. Monday night is $1 cheese slices.

name: Kevin Houchins
text: Great food....and lunch special prices

name: Wayne Hess
text: Excellent food. Relaxing and enjoyable visit

name: Jessica Smith
text: Great food and great service! The GM is always making sure everyone is satisfied. Definitely the best place to eat in Bristol!

name: Scott Kendrick
text: Pizza was great. Service was great. BUT, they lost our order and it took two hours for the meal. They were nice enough to give us the pizza for free.

name: Sharon Gross
text: Best mushroom soup ever!

name: Cash Young
text: It was great the service top notch and good price

name: Candy Vinson
text: This was a great place. Our waitress was Emily and she was fabulous.

name: Patricia Graham
text: Didn't get the right food to high cost no waitness and don't listen to you to busy cutting up with other workers

name: Denise Christenson
text:
I went to Mellow Mushroom for the first time today. The pizza was delicious!! The service
outstanding!! We will go again!!

name: ScizorM
text: When I got a pizza from there, the cheese fell right off of the pizza even when it wasn't hot. The pizza wouldn't have been good even if it would stay intact.

name: Margo Buck
text: Great trivia night

name: James King
text: Great food. Vegan options! Not the slightest problem getting them to work with my dietary restrictions. Love going Mellow!!

name: Jeff Webb
text: Good food and atmosphere. Had steak and cheese hoagie, others had cheeseburger and house special pizza. Everything was cooked to order and tasted good. The hamburger was a high quality home made type that the high end steakhouses used to ‚Ä¶More

name: Lisa Marley
text: Best pizza hands down! The crust is phenomenal. Totally worth the money. Very friendly wait staff too.

name: Kara Playz
text: Very friendly staff, the pizza was very good, and very fast service.

name: Tyler Boling
text: Pizza is kinda bland. Service is great on a plus note

name: Rhonda Flores
text: Great pizza! Amazing staff!

name: Meghan Tignor
text: love this place so much. the staff is always great. the place is very comforting. the food is fantastic. love going here when I want pizza.

name: Indoraptor 12
text: Great food! great staff!

name: Susan Westfall
text: Service slow. Prices high.

name: Kayla Dickenson
text: Always a great atmosphere. Lauren, the bartender, has always treated us like we are friends! Every one is always so attentive and fun!

name: Jacob
text: Our server was very friendly and attentive but our food took over an hour and we waited thirty minutes for two appetizers, a soup and a bruschetta. Would not recommend going here unless you want to wait 2 hours.

name: Melanie
text: Our food was fantastic the service not so much

name: Louetta Canter
text: Took a little while to get our food BUT it was $1 slice monday so they was busy. Well worth the wait, it was delicious  & our waitress was so nice!

name: Shannon Rose
text: The mushroom pizza is the best pizza I have ever had. That aioli...üòç

name: Amy EM
text: Decent pizza.  Not fond of decor but it's interesting for kids to see.  Kid friendly.  Locations in other areas seem to have better pizza.  This is a decent place in this area.

name: twistedtick
text: Extremely impressed. Food was extremely affordable AND delicious. Service was quick, polite, and friendly. The floors and tables were spotless. Will come back again!

name: YoUNG MiCHAEL Young
text: We ordered a large specialty garlic cheese bread a pretzel for the boy and bbq wings  great food

name: Ann Hartley
text: I ordered a salad and when they brought it out the lettuce was rotten. Sent it back. Ordered sub and they put rotten lettuce on it . Covered it in mayo. The meat tasted bad. Sent it back. Will never go back. The worst place ever.

name: Mary Johnson
text: Love this place.

name: Aaron Ross
text: Pizza was great. Fast service.

name: ray smullen
text: Great vegetarian options

name: LnLPlays
text: The pizza was okay but there was a black speck in the parmesan. Staff were nice but all the chefs weren't wearing anything to protect their hair from getting in the food.

name: K Ugly
text: Excellent wings and great crust on the pizza, best family dinner I've had in a long time.

name: Karen Wenger
text: Stopped by from out of town. Food was amazing, and the salad was one of the best I've eaten! Service was fast and freindly!

name: Priscilla Miller
text: I love their pizza and it's always good food but they have real employment issues. A guy leaving when we were going in this trip said, "don't go in unless you have two hours to wait on food." I asked the hostess and she said they had a rush ‚Ä¶More

name: John Berry Conway III
text: Friendly staff, good food, however the taps for the beer are off. I don't know if it's because they aren't cleaned enough, or some other maintenance issue but beers taste off and lack proper carbonation regularly.

name: Jeremy Whited
text: Fast service and friendly staff!

name: Me Hoy
text: Ireland was fantastic!!!! Made our night. She is the BEST!!

name: Vic Allen
text: Pretty good food and drinks. Love their pizza.

name: Jim Jacobs
text: My family patroned many Mellow Mushrooms from Asheville, all the way to Myrtle Beach. We were not happy with our experience. Our server was wonderful, but the management was inadequate. The manager made our whole table uncomfortable by ‚Ä¶More

name: Jessica Pierce
text: Great pizza! And we love kids night!

name: Rhonda Whitt
text: Food was awesome. Took a while to prepare though. Server seemed overwhelmed and it wasn't even really that busy. Extremely overpriced. Would eat again but not frequently.

name: Jessica Maxwell
text: Great service good food and the atmosphere is great love them old music's

name: Kay Pippin
text: Very good pizza and service. We even played Bing while there to win discounts on our bill

name: Rose Funk
text: Awesome atmosphere! Fun colorful environment, and some of the BEST pizza I've ever had! Calzones are amazing also!

name: Adam Rogers
text: Love the food and atmosphere. Wide variety and great place for the whole family. A little pricey but well worth it.

name: Colby Hinchey
text: Best place for pizza and a fun atmosphere in the Bristol area. If you're craving some great pizza and a good time check this place out.

name: donna fogelsong
text: Excellent service.  Great food.   Awesome atmosphere

name: Kelly Looney
text: The food was good besides the dressing on the chef salad it didn't taste like what I had asked for.. The bathrooms were dirty. Other then that it was ok. I will say my husband enjoyed his calzone and the mushroom soup is good. I changed my review to give a better experience.  I believe I just needed to make a better food choice.

name: John Douglas
text: Order came out wrong. Server forgot side after asking about it 3 times. I‚Äôve had decent meals ar other Mellow Mushrooms, this was forgettable.

name: Tracy Leonard
text: Best pizza..they gave me a slice of their gluten free pizza I couldn't even tell it was gluten free. Amazing service.

name: David Pedersen
text: White rabbit is excellent

name: Matthew Wells
text: Made me sick. Service was horrible

name: Chris Rivera
text: Man coolest place I've been to in a LONG TIME!!

name: Keith Fields
text: Seems like one of the smaller Mellow Mushroom locations, but we really enjoyed the feel of the place.  The food was the same as other Mellow Mushrooms, which is to say very good.

name: Dean Landreth
text: Pizza was good, sub was good... will try again

name: James Cole
text: The best pizza money can buy

name: Acacia Linkous
text: Had a wonderful experience this evening. Heather did an amazing job, she was very fast ,efficient, and friendly. The food was equally as delightful.

name: Tere Land
text: We like Mellow Mushroom. Great pizza. HOWEVER, this time it was a bit disappointing. Not only was our traditional Mighty Meaty not that tasty, but they've done away with our fav appetizer, the stuffed Portobello mushroom, which was AWESOME. ‚Ä¶More

name: John Kelly Douglas
text: I'm with Scott on this one. They messed up the order twice and never brought the chips. And then it wasn't that great. And then it was overpriced. They were nice enough to take the messed up order off the check though.

name: Jessica Looney
text: The servers here are some of the nicest people I've met, they're all incredibly personable and through. The food never disappoints, and I will forever and always love this restaurant.

name: Gorgeous Enicorn
text: Was there late. Great craft beer choices. Friendly staff. Good pizza.

name: Catt Fresh
text: So yummy!

name: Sharon Odle
text: Good food and service.  Just was a cold interior for me.  Just about froze.

name: Crystal Ogaldez
text: The pizza was really good service was friendly.

name: April Schill-Booth
